label: Cargo
comment: Information about goods being transported identifying their nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code, such as UNECE Recommendation 21 single digit codes, specifying the type of transported cargo.
The code specifying a statistical classification for this transport cargo.
The code specifying the operational category for this transport cargo, such as obnoxious or military.
Identification, expressed as text, of this transport cargo that is sufficient to identify it for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

referencedBy.comment: Transport cargo details of this referenced supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.
Transport cargo details of this referenced supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.
